choose.when:
SELECT CPU_IMAGE AS image, CPU_NAME AS title, CPU_PRICE AS price FROM COMPUTER_CPU WHERE
MAKER_CPU LIKE '%' || #{cpu} || '%'
AND
Intel_Cpu LIKE '%' || #{intelCpu} || '%'
AND
Ryzen_Cpu LIKE '%' || #{ryzenCpu} || '%'
